EmailTemplate.name: A Dealer load has been planned
EmailTemplate.subject: A new dealer load has been planned/scheduled
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Team,
A corresponding dealer load has now been scheduled for delivery. Dealer load: {!Truck_Trip__c.Name} Departure date: {!Truck_Trip__c.Departure_Date__c} Link to the trip: {!Truck_Trip__c.Link}
Please ensure the product is scheduled to be rigged as necessary. Start preparing any parts available for shipment. Notify the dealer of the pending shipment. Tag the boats accordingly. Begin preparing the dealer invoices.
Thanks for all you do!
